full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BSTAN BSRUNG SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I ZOR CHOG DAM NYAMS DGRA BGEGS PHYE MAR 'THAG PA'I GNAM LCAGS RDO RJE THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,(CES BSTAN BSRUNG SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO SKU LNGA'I SGO NAS ZOR 'PHEN TSUL DAM NYAMS DGRA BGEGS PHYE MAR THAG PA'I GNAM LCAGS @028B RDO RJE THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BDE YANGS GRVA TSANG GI BOD PA GI LHA RAM PA YE SHES DON 'GRUB KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, CHOS RJE BIKshU SU MA TI DH'I: WARTAS DAM PA'I GSUNG BZHIN GSOL BA BTAB NAS BRIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG BSTAN 'DZIN RNAMS KYI ZHABS PAD BRTAN CING 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BIKshU SU MA TI DH'I: WARTA,
